sentences.english: The zero current transformer of the type LXK is casting resin and indoor product.
sentences.chinese: 本型零序电流互感器为环氧树脂浇注户内型产品。

sentences.english: Because of his presence, many people chose to stay inside.
sentences.chinese: 由于他的出现，许多人选择呆在户内。

sentences.english: The house positions itself in Okayama Prefecture near Seto Inland Sea.
sentences.chinese: 别墅位于冈山省濑户内海附近。

sentences.english: Discuses the arrangement of the subsystem.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了户内系统的布置方式。

sentences.english: Mobility scooters can be used both outdoors and indoors.
sentences.chinese: 电动车户内户外都可以用。

sentences.english: The island of Itsukushima, in the Seto inland sea, has been a holy place of Shintoism since the earliest times.
sentences.chinese: 严岛位于濑户内海，自古以来一直是神道教的圣地。

sentences.english: Indoor use and shortterm outdoor use.
sentences.chinese: 产品适用于户内和户外短期。

sentences.english: The zero current transformer of the type LJZ is casting resin and indoor product.
sentences.chinese: 本型零序电流互感器为环氧树脂浇注户内型产品。

sentences.english: Any costs or charges incurred will be directly debited from the settlement account.
sentences.chinese: 所需费用将在投资结算户内扣取。

definition: fuel gas (coal gas, natural gas, methane etc)
pipeline/general term for pipes, cables etc
